title: Air Canada (TSX:AC): Now Is the Time to Buy! - The Motley Fool Canada

content: Air Canada TSX AC TSX AC B stock has taken on a brunt of the damage amid the coronavirus COVID pandemic with shares falling over from peak to trough over a ridiculously short period The stock got cut in half twice and while it could happen again chars
